mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Legendary Behold
potential_rewards.flavor: A valuable item. Go to the Honor Hall to collect!

quests.name: The Coming Storm
quests.description: The Talarians are expected to attack Angel I. Every attempt will be made to stop them, but Angel I must also prepare for the worst.

rewards.name: B. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Basic Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: P. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: A Premium Boost. Go to Time Portal to collect!

quests.name: Act of Betrayal
quests.description: 'Mirror' Hoshi Sato has betrayed you, taking the data from your ship's memory banks, sabotaging the ship, and escaping in a shuttle. Stop her!

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Flesh and Blood
quests.description: Starfleet needs a way to identify Lore's android doppelgangers without violating anyone's privacy. Can you develop a method that everyone approves?

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Salvage the Chavez
quests.description: Debris from your battle against the Terran Empire has rendered the Chavez unstable. Extricate the codes and weapon prototypes before it explodes!

challenges.name: Reverse Tractor Beam to Repulse Ship
Repair Heavy Loader to Uncover Crate
